english.segment1: I know I need You. I need to love You. I'd love to see You but it's been so long
english.segment2: I long to feel You. I feel this need for You. I need to hear You. Is that so wrong?
english.segment3: Now You pull me near You. When we're close I fear You. Still I'm afraid to tell you all that I've done
english.segment4: Are You done forgiving?. Can You look past my pretending?. I'm so tired of defending what I've become. What have I become?
english.segment5: But I hear You say. My love is over. It's underneath. It's inside. It's in between
english.segment6: The times that you doubt me. And when you can't feel. The times that you question. Is this for real?
english.segment7: The times that you're broken. The times that you mend. The times you hate me. The times that you bend
english.segment8: My love is over. It's underneath. It's inside. It's in between
english.segment9: The times that you're healing. And when your heart breaks. The times that you feel like you've fallen from grace
english.segment10: The times that you're hurting. The times that you heal. The times you go hungry and are tempted to steal
english.segment11: In times of confusion. In chaos and pain. I'm there in your sorrow under the weight of your shame
english.segment12: I'm there through your heart-ache. I'm there in the storm. My love I will keep you by my power alone
english.segment13: I don't care where you've fallen or where you have been. I'll never forsake you. My love never ends. It never ends
